text: Yolanda and the Thief is a 1945 American musical comedy movie directed by Vincente Minnelli and starring Fred Astaire, Lucille Bremer, Frank Morgan, Mildred Natwick, Mary Nash, Leon Ames. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn- Mayer. ==Other websites== * Category:1945 comedy movies Category:1940s American musical movies Category:MGM movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Vincente Minnelli
title: Yolanda and the Thief
